title: Riot should reduce support income to season 3 levels.
body: Supports get their items too fast because they get so much fucking gold from their gold income items as well as support items being cheap. These cheap items have more impact than the most expensive fighter/mage/marksman items. These classes need to farm hard to be able to afford these items. Meanwhile a support can have near 0 cs and reach full build faster than a fighter with near perfect farm. Last time I checked supports should be able to function without gold.

replies.body: Supports are a bit too over buffed. Brand support with a 5 ap item will 1v1 anyone on your team.
What's the difference between a mid lane brand and a support one?

Remember when riot buffed supports to actually be a team member instead of a liability nobody wants to play?

Get used to it. Botlane is a duo now, not one person and a giant minion.
